survey_brief: This survey aims to understand traveler preferences and behaviors regarding sustainable tourism practices.

questions.question_text: How important is sustainability when choosing travel destinations?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How important is sustainability when choosing travel destinations?

questions.question_text: Which sustainable travel practices do you actively seek out? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Randomize option order to reduce bias.

script.question_text: Which sustainable travel practices do you actively seek out? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from traveling more sustainably?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with open text for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional open text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from traveling more sustainably?

questions.question_text: Please specify any additional barriers not listed above.
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if 'Other' is selected in Q3
questions.client_notes: Keep open-text concise. Use for qualitative insights.

script.question_text: Please specify any additional barriers not listed above.
script.routing_logic: Only appears if 'Other' is selected in Q3

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium (e.g., 5-10%) for sustainable travel options?
answer_options: No, but I would consider it
questions.routing_logic: Appears after Q4 or Q3 (if Q4 is skipped)
questions.client_notes: Use clear pricing context. Randomize 'Yes' and 'No' options to reduce order bias.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium (e.g., 5-10%) for sustainable travel options?
answer_options: No, but I would consider it
script.routing_logic: Appears after Q4 or Q3 (if Q4 is skipped)

questions.question_text: How do you typically research sustainable travel options? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include 'Other' for broader insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with optional open text.

script.question_text: How do you typically research sustainable travel options? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What would encourage you to choose sustainable travel options more often?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question for qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 200 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text with character limit.

script.question_text: What would encourage you to choose sustainable travel options more often?

questions.question_text: Have you ever participated in a carbon offset program for travel?
answer_options: I don't know what this is
questions.client_notes: Include an option for lack of awareness to gauge education needs.

script.question_text: Have you ever participated in a carbon offset program for travel?
answer_options: I don't know what this is

questions.question_text: What type of sustainable travel content would you find most useful? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 to prioritize preferences. Randomize options.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with max selection limit.

script.question_text: What type of sustainable travel content would you find most useful? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend sustainable travel options to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency with Q1. Mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend sustainable travel options to others?
